divs: Sighting DetailsAt 12:23 AM, I was driving down Wisconsin Ave. in Bethesda, MD, on my way to work, when I observed a UFO hovering off to the side of the road. This object was overing right off the grounds of Bethesda Naval Hospital. Initially, driving towards it, I saw a pulsating white light, low in the sky. It caught my attention, and as I drove closer, I saw that it had a triangular shape, and had alternating red and white lights around it. I noticed it was not moving, and kept driving, to the point where I was directly underneath it, stopped at a traffic light. It was low to the ground--about double the height of the treeline. My window was down, and I could not hear any sound--it was completely silent. I saw it hover for another approx 5 seconds, when it slowly, without any noise, began to fly "backwards," triangle-base first, in the direction of the Naval Hospital. The traffic light turned green, and I drove away, in the opposite direction that it began flying in.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bethesda
There were no other sightings in Bethesda on or around August 6th 2008
Summary: Triangular UFO hovering near Bethesda Naval Hospital
